verses.text: I will lift up mine eyes unto the mountains: from whence shall my help come?
My help cometh the LORD, which made heaven and earth.
He will not suffer thy foot to be moved: he that keepeth thee will not slumber.
Behold, he that keepeth Israel shall neither slumber nor sleep.
The LORD is thy keeper: the LORD is thy shade upon thy right hand.
The sun shall not smite thee by day, nor the moon by night.
The LORD shall keep thee from all evil; he shall keep thy soul.
The LORD shall keep thy going out and thy coming in, from this time forth and for evermore.
